main event: A round, bright red object with a long white trail was observed in the sky for 20-25 minutes.
interesting points: The object was the size of a dime.
The white trail was 3 times as long as the object itself.
The observer thought the object was possibly a comet (Ground-Leland comet).
The sighting was reported to the Ground Observer Corps.
An Air Force search of the area found no results.
sighted object: a round, bright red object with a long white trail
